html:
6.8.17  11:08 pm   what do I do when my art sucks? sometimes there's nothing to say I think

     have you tried making it worse

6.8.17  10:54 pm   hey bill, i'm not sure if you're aware, but spotify recently opened up verification to all artists. you have to apply for "Spotify for Artists" and it takes like a week for them to accept you. i was able to verify my profile without going through my aggregator, and i have like 2 followers or something stupid. you should be able to do it i think. this would allow you to get a profile/background pic (though you still have to go through Rovi for the description info)

     i am verified, but last i checked the picture has to come through rovi. it is frustrating to deal with, everything is delayed, and all the instructions are always very friendly and smiley while also telling you that you're not really allowed to do anything. i'm just thankful that i found a way to get my music up there at all

6.8.17  10:19 pm   Approximately how many noodles should one put into their soup?

     try an amount you've never tried before

6.8.17  10:10 pm   I think Bill died, or tried to fake his own death again. He hasn't answered a question in over 24 hours. Oh no... My question: BILL DID YOU DIE???!?!?!

     i will check

6.8.17  9:02 pm   Why are all of your headers misspelled? like thabk you and ueqstions

     graphics free title graphics

6.8.17  6:06 pm   You genuinely got me interested into history through the way you made your video, do you intend on ever making any other videos similar to the one about Japan or the history of the world?

     yes

6.8.17  5:59 pm   Do you think it would be a good idea to hire someone temporarily to update your reality page? Maybe even make some videos for audio you skipped through before history of japan.

     i think that's a great idea. i have no idea how to build trust with anyone enough to give them access to the entire archive
6.8.17  5:55 pm   Opinion on fidget spinners?

6.8.17  4:05 pm   do you see youtube as ever being a feasible way to make a living?

     the best way to make money from youtube is to put advertisements before or during your videos, which is in no way part of my game plan

6.8.17  3:19 pm   Would you ever consider making a sort of 'tutorial' of how you create your music/videos?

     yes

6.8.17  12:17 pm   why is vacationing in the center of the earth unclickable?

     the same reason this text here is un clickable. you are supposed to just read the text, and enjoy

6.8.17  11:48 am   Are you going to make any videos before you will finish all those 395 songs?

     yes
6.8.17  10:39 am   Not to get too personal but how big is your wingading?

6.8.17  9:54 am   hi bill, do you have any tips on how to keep yourself motivated throughout an entire project? how do you keep yourself from getting tired and quitting on something that takes as long as the hotewig

6.8.17  8:53 am   Would you say you are a workaholic?

     no

6.8.17  8:48 am   Have you ever thought about doing vocal covers of songs and adding your own twist to it?

     oh hell yeah

6.8.17  7:25 am   If a television studio offered you a contract to make your history videos into a television series, would you take the offer?

     no. i have received offers like that before

6.8.17  4:40 am   Why don't you put ads on the videos? That way you can buy yourself a brand new used car

     that would be a drag on the viewing experience

6.8.17  2:14 am   ''it was not made yet at that time'' But you held the award in your hand?

     that was a blank one. i had to hand it back, so they could give it to the next person

6.8.17  1:59 am   why havent you made more videos?

     i think the real question is, why haven't You made more videos

6.8.17  1:31 am   I'm actually a bit confused and I'm sorry if you've answered this-is the intention right now to do a mix of songs and videos based of the randomized process, songs for now and then add in videos much later, or are you going to try and do all the songs in the system first?

     i need to make sure the song schedule is secure. i want it to be 1 per week but i'm not sure if that's possible for some of them. i need to get the schedule rolling and keep it going until i stop feeling like i'm 'way behind' on songs. there are many other important things to do too, such as more videos, but songs need to be the 1st priority right now, until i am a bit more caught up

6.8.17  12:47 am   What if I don't want to ask a question?

     then perhaps you shouldn't have

6.8.17  12:23 am   you really like singing "it's alright" dont ya?

     well, i like writing it. and then i have to sing what i wrote. most of the times i have written it have not yet been sung

6.8.17  12:01 am   why have you chosen not to put your new songs on youtube, even with the record spinning thing or just no video?

     i would consider it, but i don't think that's the best use of my channel

6.7.17  11:34 pm   I'm surprised you didn't mention the Trojan War in the hotew,ig video and the subsequent book titled The Iliad being released (which was basically the equivalent of the bible in the ancient world), when briefly touching upon the topic of the Mycenaean Greeks. Is this because you don't believe in the validity of a Trojan War having occured (albeit without divine intervention), or because you couldn't fit it into the video? https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Hisarlik
6.7.17  11:21 pm   are you gonna update the reality page anytime soon?

6.7.17  11:10 pm   are you stupid?

     i will check

6.7.17  11:10 pm   who will win the nba finals

     the golden state warriors

6.7.17  10:48 pm   nyc sounds lovely. :( i'm stuck in the suburban southern united states, how do i get there??? im tired of people looking at me speed walking through kroger to buy a damn gallon of milk

     oh too real

6.7.17  10:43 pm   Do you have a team of producers and animator,

     no

     or are you a solo?

     i work alone

6.7.17  10:39 pm   You said ''going to pull a prank on the police by committing a crime and not telling them it was me''. Did you commit it? What did you commit?

     writing fictional tweets, for your viewing enjoyment

6.7.17  10:31 pm   Why isn't your profile picture on Spotify an umbrella?

     spotify doesn't let you change that, unless you are very important person. i actually have to pay 2 different companies just to have my music up there at all.

6.7.17  9:35 pm   hey bill do I have to ask a question?

     no

6.7.17  9:25 pm   how do you stop caring about what people think about you?

     start thinking things about them

6.7.17  9:15 pm   If a wizard put a musical curse on you... Which of the following would you pick?... Only allowed to play songs in the key of C major (diatonic notes only... C,D,E,F,G, A and B.. no chromatic passing tones or any funny business)?... Only allowed to play root-position major or minor triads (no inversions, no 7ths or extended chords, no augmented or diminished chords... just 1,3,5 or 1, b3, 5)?... Or all songs must be in 4/4 time with a tempo of 90bpm, and you're never allowed to subdivide a beat into anything other than a quarter note, half note, or whole note (no eighth or sixteenth notes/rests, no quarter note triplets, no ties, dotted quarters, etc)?

     i guess i'd have to find a way to reverse the curse

6.7.17  9:05 pm   ooh, were the saxophones in I'm crazy / it's raining one of those random instrument things? either way that's like my favorite part of the song. haha just kidding the whole song is my favorite part of the song

     yes, crazy raining uses the randomization system heavily

6.7.17  8:32 pm   Do you answer to philosophical questions or just to questions about your career?

     i answer all types of questions. i usually don't pay attention to which type is which

6.7.17  8:26 pm   Have you ever answered a question grammatically correct before?

     i do it many times a day, but i respect your opinion
6.7.17  6:54 pm   you seem to answer questions at all hours - do you sleep? (asked by someone who can't sleep and or can't wake up)
6.7.17  6:49 pm   What was reason behind putting a password page with no password leading to the Reality page?

6.7.17  6:29 pm   Why is history of the entire world I guess in 25 frames per second

     seems reasonable to me. why does your question have 66 characters

6.7.17  6:16 pm   Do you still "practice" music in the sense of trying to learn and master specific musical concepts and techniques? Or do you think it's best to just learn and improve through experimentation and song-writing?

6.7.17  6:01 pm   Do you Know how many people have visited this website? Because I think it's cool,but unpopular

     it is popular, i get a lot of offers from advertisers who want to put their ads here

6.7.17  5:53 pm   Will you write a grammatically correct answer ever?

     i do it many times a day, but i respect your opinion

6.7.17  4:56 pm   I am currently in the middle of a large project (a mobile game), and I'd say I'm about 70% done after a good few months, but I'm a little sick of it, and a small project schedule sounds really appealing. Is this similar to how you felt during hotewig?

     i was desperate to get to the songs, since way before i started history of the world. but i was completely sure that history of the world was the right decision, and needed to be finished before moving on.

      Do you have any advice?

     not really, if you know you need to finish it then you will find a way to pull it together. it helps to have a mass of people accusing you of doing nothing the entire time

6.7.17  4:22 pm   Ever thought of collaborating with someone on videos?

     

6.7.17  4:12 pm   It took me a while to find my question answered here. Are you sure you can't make something a bit more organized? Great aesthetic, though :D

     i think it is organized in a way that makes sense. but for your convenience i have made your question much larger than everyone else's

6.7.17  3:44 pm   Are all of these gestions real? Asking for a friend.

     yes

6.7.17  3:09 pm   Wtf is your scramble page? 😂

     anagrams. it's when you rearrange the letters

6.7.17  2:58 pm   do you ever want to claim those play buttons you've earned on youtube and hang them proudly on your wall?

     i'm not sure how

6.7.17  2:40 pm   wait so are you gonna do only the medium length songs without a video and then only post them here and not on yt

     the songs will also be sent to most of the major online music stores and streaming sites. and also posted for free on this website
